subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Andruw Jones hit his 350th home run, Chuck James tied a career high with eight strikeouts and the Atlanta Braves defeated the Milwaukee Brewers, 2-1, yesterday. The Brewers have lost six in a row.
snippet: Andruw Jones hit his 350th home run, Chuck James tied a career high with eight strikeouts and the Atlanta Braves defeated the Milwaukee Brewers, 2-1, yesterday. The Brewers have lost six in a row.
